text: The House of Grimaldi is associated with the history of the Republic of Genoa, Italy and of the Principality of Monaco. The head of the present family is Prince Albert II of Monaco.Wayne C. Thompson, Western Europe 2014 (Lanham: Rowman & Littlefield Publishers, 2014), p. 167 He is the son of Rainier III, Prince of Monaco and Grace Kelly. The state is also well known for having a Princess in her own right. == References ==
title: House of Grimaldi
